name: Just Jump
description:
Just Jump is a simple 2D Platformer racing game, where your goal is to set the best time, but with one catch you can't jump!
With only 2 buttons to worry about, you would think that it's going to be easy. But fear not you will struggle.
Prepare for a near impossible challenge. Push your skills and luck to the limit as you take on the challenges of this game.

Game Features

  • Left and Right movement!
  • A Reset button!
  • No! Jumping!
  • A main menu!
  • A pause menu!
  • 20 Levels!
  • Achievements
  • Options menu
  • Leader boards

This game is the second version of the game, I first made it in 2016 when i started learning game programming and design, but I didn't feel like publishing it. The idea of the game came from a mistake in my original code, that caused the spinning. After some playing around with it I figured out I could make quite an interesting game. Now that I have had more time and had the game tested by my friends, I figured that with some more work on it, that I could publish the game. So the 20 levels that are in the game, also know as the old levels are the original levels from the first time I made the game.

Game Features to come

  • Customization
  • Level editor
  • Steam workshop
  • Online multiplayer
  • Split screen multiplayer
  • Game modes
  • Story mode
  • Lots of levels
  • Music
